assignedto_id.description: The ID of the user the entire test run is assigned to

blocked_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run marked as blocked

completed_on.description: The date/time when the test run was closed (as UNIX timestamp)

config.description: The configuration of the test run as string (if part of a test plan)

config_ids.description: The array of IDs of the configurations of the test run (if part of a test plan)

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the test run

created_on.description: The date/time when the test run was created (as UNIX timestamp)

custom_status1_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

custom_status2_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

custom_status3_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

custom_status4_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

custom_status5_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

custom_status6_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

custom_status7_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

custom_status8_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

custom_status9_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run with the respective custom status

description.description: The description of the test run

failed_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run marked as failed

id.description: The unique ID of the test run

include_all.description: True if the test run includes all test cases and false otherwise

is_completed.description: True if the test run was closed and false otherwise

milestone_id.description: The ID of the milestone this test run belongs to

name.description: The name of the test run

passed_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run marked as passed

plan_id.description: The ID of the test plan this test run belongs to

project_id.description: The ID of the project this test run belongs to

retest_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run marked as retest

suite_id.description: The ID of the test suite this test run is derived from

untested_count.description: The amount of tests in the test run marked as untested

url.description: The address/URL of the test run in the user interface
